text: Reşide Bayar (1886, Bursa - 24 December 1962, Ankara) was the 3rd First Lady of Turkey. She was the wife of Celal Bayar, the 3rd President of Turkey, until her death on 24 December 1962. While on a train from İstanbul to Ankara she died of a heart attack. Nilüfer has been named Turgut and two children. == References == Category:1886 births Category:1962 deaths Category:First Ladies of Turkey
title: Reşide Bayar
